purpleculture_pinyin:
huá
to play Chinese finger-guessing game
играть в китайскую игру по угадыванию пальцев

huō
opening; stake all; sacrifice; crack; slit
открытие; ставить все на кон; жертва; трескаться; разрез

huò
clear; open; exempt (from); liberal-minded
Чисто; открыто; освобождаются от); либерально настроенный
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 害 indicates the sound; 谷 (valley) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
豁拳 [ huá quán ]: variant of 划拳
豁出去 [ huō chu qu ]: to throw caution to the wind; to press one's luck; to go for broke
头童齿豁 [ tóu tóng chǐ huō ]: decrepit; old (idiom)
豁达 [ huò dá ]: optimistic; sanguine; generous; magnanimous; open-minded
豁免 [ huò miǎn ]: to exempt; exemption
豁然开朗 [ huò rán kāi lǎng ]: suddenly opens up to a wide panorama (idiom); to come to a wide clearing; fig. everything becomes clear at once; to achieve speedy enlightenment
豁然 [ huò rán ]: wide and open; a flash of understanding
显豁 [ xiǎn huò ]: evident; clear and bright

heisig_chinese_memo: If water breaches the valley during a flood, the people there will all be in harm's way.
Ru_trainchinese:
huō: (глаг) треснуть, разойтись, лопнуть; жертвовать, посвятить себя, отдавать
huò: (графема) освобождать от, прощать
huò: (графема) широкий, просторный; ясный, открытый (об образе мышления)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If water breaches the valley during a flood, the people there will all be in harm's way.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " valley ", the sound of " harm ", the original meaning is a smooth valley. "Said Wen": "Tonggu Ye. Conggu, bad sound."

" Exclusive " can mean open and spacious. "Han Shu-Yang Xiong Chuan 1": "Sprinkling Shentuo on the blasphemy, and sowing the Jiuhe on the east side." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Open it, open it."

" Xuan " also means open-mindedness and generosity. "Wen Xuan-Pan Yue "Xi Zheng Fu"": "Keep it open in the chest, the group is kind and must be done."

" Huo " also means emptiness. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Xijing Fu"": "He Gongqiao’s magnificent virginity, crosses the Qi to open up to sparse the latitude." Li Shan quoted "Guang Ya": "open, empty."

" Xuan " also means profound appearance. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Xijing Fu"": "Faithful, lonely orange; lonely Chengguang, lonely and open."

" Xuan " also means to dissipate. Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "The collection is like the clouds, scattered like clouds."

" Xuan " also refers to dredging. "Dunhuang Bianwen Collection-Vimalakirti Sutra Lectures": "Being good at exempting the Three Vehicles, can open six degrees."

" Xuan " also means dismissal and venting. Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Ya Liang": "So I am open to grief, and the color is comfortable."

" Xuan " also means stretch. Tang Dufu "Five Hundred Words of Praying for the First Time from Beijing to Feng": "How foolish is Xu's body, stealing than Ji and Deeds... It's just a matter of building a coffin, and this will always be open."

" Excluded " also means an exemption. Song Liuzai, "Thanks to Zhao, Enlisting Jun for Exempting Rent": "The long list of Zhu Shu is also written in ink, so that the monarch issues orders to escape rent."

" Xuan " can also mean a moment, and it can be described quickly. "Kingben Popular Novels-Wrongly Killing Cui Ning": "The door is closed without closing, the thief pushed it slightly, and it opened."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " valley ", the sound of " harm ", the original meaning is a smooth valley.
humanum_full_description:
從「谷」，「害」聲，本義為通暢的山谷。《說文》：「通谷也。从谷，害聲。」

　　「豁」可表示開闊、寬敞。《漢書‧揚雄傳上》：「灑沈菑於豁瀆兮，播九河於東瀕。」顏師古注：「豁，開也。」

　　「豁」也表示豁達、大度。《文選‧潘岳〈西征賦〉》：「胸中豁其洞開，群善湊而必舉。」

　　「豁」還表示空虛。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「何工巧之瑰瑋，交綺豁以疏寮。」李善注引《廣雅》：「豁，空也。」

　　「豁」亦表示深邃貌。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「馺娑駘盪，燾奡桔桀；枍詣承光，睽罛庨豁。」

　　「豁」也指消散。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「集若霞布，散若雲豁。」

　　「豁」亦指疏通。《敦煌變文集‧維摩詰經講經文》：「善豁三乘理，能開六度關。」

　　「豁」還表示排遣、發泄。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧雅量》：「於是豁情散哀，顏色自若。」

　　「豁」也表示舒展。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先詠懷五百字〉：「許身一何愚，竊比稷與契……蓋棺事則已，此志常覬豁。」

　　「豁」還指豁免。宋劉宰〈謝趙使君豁租〉：「長榜朱書又墨書，使君頒令豁逃租。」

　　「豁」亦能表示轉瞬，形容很快。《京本通俗小說‧錯斬崔寧》：「門兒拽上不關，那賊略推一推，豁地開了。」
humanum_short_description: 從「谷」，「害」聲，本義為通暢的山谷。

Chinese: If water breaches the valley during a flood, the people there will all be in harm's way.
Meaning: breach
Story: If water breaches the valley during a flood, the people there will all be in harm's way.
Kind: traditional

從「 谷 」，「 害 」聲，本義為通暢的山谷。《說文》：「通谷也。从谷，害聲。」 「 豁 」可表示開闊、寬敞。《漢書‧揚雄傳上》：「灑沈菑於豁瀆兮，播九河於東瀕。」顏師古注：「豁，開也。」 「 豁 」也表示豁達、大度。《文選‧潘岳〈西征賦〉》：「胸中豁其洞開，群善湊而必舉。」 「 豁 」還表示空虛。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「何工巧之瑰瑋，交綺豁以疏寮。」李善注引《廣雅》：「豁，空也。」 「 豁 」亦表示深邃貌。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「馺娑駘盪，燾奡桔桀；枍詣承光，睽罛庨豁。」 「 豁 」也指消散。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「集若霞布，散若雲豁。」 「 豁 」亦指疏通。《敦煌變文集‧維摩詰經講經文》：「善豁三乘理，能開六度關。」 「 豁 」還表示排遣、發泄。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧雅量》：「於是豁情散哀，顏色自若。」 「 豁 」也表示舒展。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先詠懷五百字〉：「許身一何愚，竊比稷與契……蓋棺事則已，此志常覬豁。」 「 豁 」還指豁免。宋劉宰〈謝趙使君豁租〉：「長榜朱書又墨書，使君頒令豁逃租。」 「 豁 」亦能表示轉瞬，形容很快。《京本通俗小說‧錯斬崔寧》：「門兒拽上不關，那賊略推一推，豁地開了。」
From the " valley", the sound of " harm", the original meaning is a smooth valley. "Said Wen": "Tonggu Ye. Conggu, bad sound." " Exclusive" can mean open and spacious. "Han Shu-Yang Xiong Chuan 1": "Sprinkling Shentuo on the blasphemy, and sowing the Jiuhe on the east side." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Open it, open it." " Xuan" also means open-mindedness and generosity. "Wen Xuan-Pan Yue "Xi Zheng Fu"": "Keep it open in the chest, the group is kind and must be done." " Huo" also means emptiness. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Xijing Fu"": "He Gongqiao’s magnificent virginity, crosses the Qi to open up to sparse the latitude." Li Shan quoted "Guang Ya": "open, empty." " Xuan" also means profound appearance. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Xijing Fu"": "Faithful, lonely orange; lonely Chengguang, lonely and open." " Xuan" also means to dissipate. Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "The collection is like the clouds, scattered like clouds." " Xuan" also refers to dredging. "Dunhuang Bianwen Collection-Vimalakirti Sutra Lectures": "Being good at exempting the Three Vehicles, can open six degrees." " Xuan" also means dismissal and venting. Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Ya Liang": "So I am open to grief, and the color is comfortable." " Xuan" also means stretch. Tang Dufu "Five Hundred Words of Praying for the First Time from Beijing to Feng": "How foolish is Xu's body, stealing than Ji and Deeds... It's just a matter of building a coffin, and this will always be open." " Excluded" also means an exemption. Song Liuzai, "Thanks to Zhao, Enlisting Jun for Exempting Rent": "The long list of Zhu Shu is also written in ink, so that the monarch issues orders to escape rent." " Xuan" can also mean a moment, and it can be described quickly. "Kingben Popular Novels-Wrongly Killing Cui Ning": "The door is closed without closing, the thief pushed it slightly, and it opened."

Name meaning
It means to split, split.
huō, huò, huá
I
гл. А
1) huō быть широко раскрытым (распахнутым); зиять; открывать проход; раскрытый настежь; нараспашку, настежь
齿发将秃豁 волосы выпадут, зубы совсем поредеют
豁开 широко распахнуться
2) huō разойтись, лопнуть (напр. о шве)
襻钮儿豁了 петля лопнула
3) huò раздаваться, открываться в глубину, уходить в вышину; раздавшийся, глубокий, высокий
豁险 глубокая пропасть, высокий обрыв
4) huò быть великодушным (щедрым, доступным); великодушный; широкий (об образе мыслей); щедро, широко
гл. Б
1) huō широко раскрывать, распахивать; держать настежь (нараспашку)
豁门 распахнуть дверь
豁目 смотреть широко раскрытыми глазами
2) huō вспарывать, вскрывать
豁地 вспахивать землю
3) huō бросать на землю; отдавать, жертвовать
豁一天工夫去办理 пожертвовать на это целый день
豁着命去干 заниматься (чём-л.), не щадя жизни
豁麦子 сеять пшеницу
4) huò прощать (что-л.), спускать (вину); освобождать от (напр. налогов)
II huō
сущ. * горловина; ущелье; расщелина, скважина
山豁 ущелье в горах; расщелина
